sentences.en: Administration costs are passed on to the customer.
sentences.cn: 行政费用转嫁给了消费者。

sentences.en: As one former customer said cynically, "He's probably pocketed the difference!"
sentences.cn: 正如一位愤世嫉俗的旧主顾所说的那样，“他很可能把差额塞进了自己的腰包！”

sentences.en: Call our customer careline for advice.
sentences.cn: 请拨打我们的客户服务热线咨询。
免费拨打我们的客服电话。

sentences.en: Good customer relations require courtesy, professionalism and effective response.
sentences.cn: 良好的客户关系需要做到礼貌、专业，并提供有效的回复。

sentences.en: He’s one of our regular customers .
sentences.cn: 他是我们的一个老主顾。

sentences.en: If there's anything I can't stand it's an indecisive, wishy-washy customer.
sentences.cn: 如果说我有什么不能容忍的话，那就是犹犹豫豫、挑来挑去的客户。

sentences.en: In a true market, the customer can take business elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 在真正的市场中，顾客可以去别处洽谈业务。

sentences.en: In some stores we were undermanned and customer service was suffering.
sentences.cn: 有些店我们人手不足，对顾客照顾不周。

sentences.en: Several manufacturers are also nibbling away at Ford's traditional customer base.
sentences.cn: 几家制造商也在蚕食福特公司的传统客户群。

sentences.en: Sometimes small firms can outdo big business when it comes to customer care.
sentences.cn: 在顾客服务方面，有时小企业可能优于大企业。

sentences.en: The company has been expanding its customer base using trade magazine advertising.
sentences.cn: 公司一直通过在商业杂志上刊登广告扩展客户群。

sentences.en: The customer will not dig down for such food.
sentences.cn: 那个顾客不会为这种食物掏腰包的.

sentences.en: The owners of the store have stepped up customer mailings.
sentences.cn: 店主们加大了对顾客的邮寄宣传力度。

sentences.en: We aim to offer good value and service to all our customers.
sentences.cn: 我们力求为所有的客户提供物有所值的商品和服务。

sentences.en: We need to appeal to a wider customer base.
sentences.cn: 我们需要吸引更广泛的客户。

sentences.en: We’ve had several letters from satisfied customers.
sentences.cn: 我们收到了几封顾客表示满意的来信。

words.tran_cn: 依照顾客具体要求而制造（等于customize）

phrases.tran_cn: 顾客导向；以顾客为中心

trans.tran_en: someone who buys goods or services from a shop, company etc
